keys: dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) de ensino

      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Hola , Julio: ... Tu amiga, Laura.</string>
            <string language="en">Dear Julio, ... Your friend, Laura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lieber Julio... Ihr Freund, Laura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cher Julio... Votre ami, Laura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caro Julio... Seu amigo, Laura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caro Julio... Il vostro amico, Laura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αγαπητός Julio... ο φίλος σας, Laura</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica interactiva (MUD) adreçada al primer nivell del cicle mitjà de primària que presenta les diferents parts d'una carta. Conté activitats de pràctica (Practica) que relacionen cada part amb el contingut corresponent tot treballant el nom de cada apartat. També disposa d'activitats d'avaluació (Avalua't) en què s'insisteix en l'estructura del contingut.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) aimed at 8-year-olds on the different parts of a letter. It includes practice activities matching the content and name of each part and self-assessment exercises on letter structure.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material educatiu</string>
            <string language="en">instructional materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mètode multimèdia</string>
            <string language="en">multimedia method</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">suport a l'ensenyament</string>
            <string language="en">teaching aids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) strebte 8-year-olds auf den unterschiedlichen Teilen eines 
Zeichens an. Sie schließt die Praxisaktivitäten ein, die den 
Inhalt und den Namen der Übungen jedes Teils und der Selbstbewertung 
auf Briefaufbau zusammenbringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) a
visé 8-year-olds sur les différentes parties d'une lettre. 
Elle inclut des activités de pratique appariant la teneur et le
nom de chaque partie et des exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sur la 
structure de lettre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) visou 
8-year-olds nas partes diferentes de uma letra. Inclui as 
atividades da prática que combinam o índice e o nome de exercícios 
de cada parte e de self-assessment na estrutura de letra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) ha
puntato su 8-year-olds sulle parti differenti di una lettera. 
Include le attività di pratica che abbinano il contenuto ed il 
nome delle esercitazioni di valutazione di se stesso e di ogni parte 
sulla struttura di lettera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) που 
στοχεύει στο 8-έτος στα διαφορετικά μέρη μιας επιστολής. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες πρακτικής που ταιριάζουν με 
το περιεχόμενο και το όνομα των ασκήσεων κάθε μερών και 
αυτοαξιολόγησης στη δομή επιστολών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtsmaterialien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multimediamethode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
